name: Prize Pumpkin TD (slimefriend)
description:
Prize Pumpkin TD

Prize Pumpkin TD is a tower defense about planting plants, defeating ants, and protecting your prized vegetables!

Place down pots and then water them to grow your plants -- as plants grow, their abilities change!

Experiment with different plant states at different positions to find the optimal strategy for each level!

Credits

Programming, Design, Art  ------------  Taylor Anderson

Design, Music, Sound  ------------  Colin Zarzour
